targets.rawSql:
SELECT 
   REPLACE(REPLACE(REPLACE(REPLACE(REPLACE(
        REPLACE(
            REPLACE(
                REPLACE(a.name, ' - TOTAL AUTENTICADAS', ''), 
                ' - TOTAL ONLINE', ''
            ), 
            ' - TOTAL OFFLINE', ''
        ), 
        ' - TEMPERATURA', ''
    ),
    ' - TX POWER', ''),
    'Status da interface  ', ''),
    'Trafego de Entrada na Interface ',''),
    'Trafego de Saida na Interface ','') AS PON,
    MAX(CASE WHEN t.value = 'AUTENTICADAS_PON' 
             THEN (SELECT hu.value FROM history_uint hu WHERE hu.itemid = a.itemid ORDER BY hu.clock DESC LIMIT 1) 
        END) AS AUTENTICADAS,
        MAX(CASE WHEN t.value = 'ONLINE_PON' 
             THEN (SELECT hu.value FROM history_uint hu WHERE hu.itemid = a.itemid ORDER BY hu.clock DESC LIMIT 1) 
        END) AS ONLINE,
            MAX(CASE WHEN t.value = 'OFFLINE_PON' 
             THEN (SELECT hu.value FROM history_uint hu WHERE hu.itemid = a.itemid ORDER BY hu.clock DESC LIMIT 1) 
        END) AS OFFLINE,
    MAX(CASE WHEN t.value = 'TEMPERATURA_PON' 
             THEN (SELECT h.value FROM history_uint h WHERE h.itemid = a.itemid ORDER BY h.clock DESC LIMIT 1) 
        END) AS TEMPERATURA,
    MAX(CASE WHEN t.value = 'POTENCIA_PON' 
             THEN (SELECT h.value FROM history_uint h WHERE h.itemid = a.itemid ORDER BY h.clock DESC LIMIT 1) 
        END) AS "POTﾃ劾CIA DE SAﾃ好A",
    MAX(CASE WHEN t.value = 'Net_status' 
             THEN (SELECT h.value FROM history_uint h WHERE h.itemid = a.itemid ORDER BY h.clock DESC LIMIT 1) 
        END) AS STATUS,
    MAX(CASE WHEN t.value = 'Network' 
             THEN (SELECT h.value FROM history_uint h join items as z on z.itemid = h.itemid
              WHERE h.itemid = a.itemid and z.name like '%Entrada%' ORDER BY h.clock DESC LIMIT 1) 
        END) AS ENTRADA,
        MAX(CASE WHEN t.value = 'Network' 
             THEN (SELECT h.value FROM history_uint h join items as z on z.itemid = h.itemid
              WHERE h.itemid = a.itemid and z.name like '%Saida%' ORDER BY h.clock DESC LIMIT 1) 
        END) AS SAﾃ好A,
        (MAX(CASE WHEN t.value = 'AUTENTICADAS_PON' 
             THEN (SELECT hu.value FROM history_uint hu WHERE hu.itemid = a.itemid ORDER BY hu.clock DESC LIMIT 1) 
        END)/128)*100 AS OCUPAﾃﾃグ
FROM items a
INNER JOIN item_tag t 
    ON t.itemid = a.itemid
    AND t.value IN ('AUTENTICADAS_PON', 'TEMPERATURA_PON', 'POTENCIA_PON', 
                    'OFFLINE_PON', 'ONLINE_PON', 'Net_status','Network')
left join hosts as c on c.hostid = a.hostid
WHERE c.host = '$OLT' and a.flags = 4 and a.name like '%GPON%' AND SUBSTRING_INDEX(SUBSTRING_INDEX(a.name, '/', 2), '/', -1) = $PLACA
GROUP BY PON

SELECT 
   REPLACE(REPLACE(REPLACE(REPLACE(REPLACE(
        REPLACE(
            REPLACE(
                REPLACE(a.name, ' - TOTAL AUTENTICADAS', ''), 
                ' - TOTAL ONLINE', ''
            ), 
            ' - TOTAL OFFLINE', ''
        ), 
        ' - TEMPERATURA', ''
    ),
    ' - TX POWER', ''),
    'Status da interface  ', ''),
    'Trafego de Entrada na Interface ',''),
    'Trafego de Saida na Interface ','') AS PON,
    MAX(CASE WHEN t.value = 'AUTENTICADAS_PON' 
             THEN (SELECT hu.value FROM history_uint hu WHERE hu.itemid = a.itemid ORDER BY hu.clock DESC LIMIT 1) 
        END) AS AUTENTICADAS,
        MAX(CASE WHEN t.value = 'ONLINE_PON' 
             THEN (SELECT hu.value FROM history_uint hu WHERE hu.itemid = a.itemid ORDER BY hu.clock DESC LIMIT 1) 
        END) AS ONLINE,
            MAX(CASE WHEN t.value = 'OFFLINE_PON' 
             THEN (SELECT hu.value FROM history_uint hu WHERE hu.itemid = a.itemid ORDER BY hu.clock DESC LIMIT 1) 
        END) AS OFFLINE,
    MAX(CASE WHEN t.value = 'TEMPERATURA_PON' 
             THEN (SELECT h.value FROM history_uint h WHERE h.itemid = a.itemid ORDER BY h.clock DESC LIMIT 1) 
        END) AS TEMPERATURA,
    MAX(CASE WHEN t.value = 'POTENCIA_PON' 
             THEN (SELECT h.value FROM history_uint h WHERE h.itemid = a.itemid ORDER BY h.clock DESC LIMIT 1) 
        END) AS "POTﾃ劾CIA DE SAﾃ好A",
    MAX(CASE WHEN t.value = 'Net_status' 
             THEN (SELECT h.value FROM history_uint h WHERE h.itemid = a.itemid ORDER BY h.clock DESC LIMIT 1) 
        END) AS STATUS,
    MAX(CASE WHEN t.value = 'Network' 
             THEN (SELECT h.value FROM history_uint h join items as z on z.itemid = h.itemid
              WHERE h.itemid = a.itemid and z.name like '%Entrada%' ORDER BY h.clock DESC LIMIT 1) 
        END) AS ENTRADA,
        MAX(CASE WHEN t.value = 'Network' 
             THEN (SELECT h.value FROM history_uint h join items as z on z.itemid = h.itemid
              WHERE h.itemid = a.itemid and z.name like '%Saida%' ORDER BY h.clock DESC LIMIT 1) 
        END) AS SAﾃ好A,
        (MAX(CASE WHEN t.value = 'AUTENTICADAS_PON' 
             THEN (SELECT hu.value FROM history_uint hu WHERE hu.itemid = a.itemid ORDER BY hu.clock DESC LIMIT 1) 
        END)/128)*100 AS OCUPAﾃﾃグ
FROM items a
INNER JOIN item_tag t 
    ON t.itemid = a.itemid
    AND t.value IN ('AUTENTICADAS_PON', 'TEMPERATURA_PON', 'POTENCIA_PON', 
                    'OFFLINE_PON', 'ONLINE_PON', 'Net_status','Network')
left join hosts as c on c.hostid = a.hostid
WHERE c.host = '$OLT' and a.flags = 4 and a.name like '%GPON%' AND SUBSTRING_INDEX(SUBSTRING_INDEX(a.name, '/', 2), '/', -1) = $PLACA
GROUP BY PON

title: RESUMO DE PON ON E OFF
